mapper.select: SELECT oi.order_id AS orderId, oi.product_id AS productId, p.name AS productName, p.store_id AS storeId, p.price AS price, p.discount_price AS discountPrice, oi.quantity AS quantity, oi.status AS status, p.thumbnail_image_url AS thumbnailImageUrl FROM order_item oi JOIN product p ON oi.product_id = p.id JOIN order_table ot ON oi.order_id = ot.order_id WHERE ot.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY oi.order_id DESC
